code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Routes,Link}from'react-router-dom';import loadData from'./googleSheets';import ProductCard handlePromoCode=code=>{if(code==='SUMMER20'){setDiscount(0.2);alert('Промокод применен! Скидка 20%!');}else{alert('Неверный
